desc: 100% organic and plant-based (vegan) foods. Free from gluten and lactose. Inspired by Indian, Mexican, Thai and European cuisine. Nourishing and full of flavour. EU's first low FODMAP certified meals. Low FODMAP certification by the Monash University. Delivered to your home or office.

layout.text: 100% plant-based gourmet. Free from gluten and lactose. Nourishing and full of flavour. Europe's first certified organic low FODMAP meals. Delivered to your home or office.
